name: MeatlyJam: A Game About Making A Game For MeatlyJam, Made For Meatly Jam
name_original: MeatlyJam: A Game About Making A Game For MeatlyJam, Made For Meatly Jam
description:
Lost? Hover other things! Pretty much everything has a toolip!

'Twas the night before MeatlyJam

And all through the house

Not a creature was stirring

Except...

A Game Developer!

It's MeatlyJam time, help this poor developer build their magnum opus in just 48 hours. Manage their energy, creativity and motivation as they struggle against the fiends of insecurity, random ideas and glitches, oh the glitches!

Features

  • All the fun of the game jam, with none of the marketable end product!
  • Terrible reviews!
  • A pinch of silly!
  • Exclamation marks!
